questions.questionText: Which is the most popular JavaScript framework?
What's the fundamental building block of React apps?
If we pass a function to useState, when will that function be called?
answers: Each time we update the state
The first time we update the state

questions.questionText: Which hook to use for an API request on the component's initial render?
Which variables should go into the useEffect dependency array?
answers: All state and props referenced in the effect
All variables needed for clean up
